content:
Which of the following are fruits?
Cantaloupe, Carrot, Lettuce, Bacon, Avocado, Chicken, Banana, Cherry, Watermelon, Apple, Tomato

chosen:
The following items on this list are fruit:
- Cantaloupe
- Avocado
- Banana
- Cherry
- Watermelon
- Apple
- Tomato
rejected:
The following items are classified as fruits:
- Cantaloupe
- Cherries
- Watermelon
- Apples
snaprejected:
The following items are classified as fruits:
- Cantaloupe
- Cherries
- Watermelon
- Apples
snapchosen:
The following items on this list are fruit:
- Cantaloupe
- Avocado
- Banana
- Cherry
- Watermelon
- Apple
- Tomato
